location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has been slightly affected by pest damage which has partially obscured the signature of the letter. However, the author of the letter can still be identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a dispatch (not present) from the Chief Secretary and sends information concerning the movements of Aga Abdul Russool [Āghā ‘Abd al-Rasūl].
